languages.text: "Кажется, связь с Лорд-капитаном потихоньку сводит Кибеллу с ума. Не пора ли ее..."
"It seems the connection with the Lord Captain is slowly driving Kibellah mad. Should we maybe..."
languages.original_text: "Кажется, связь с Лорд-капитаном потихоньку сводит Кибеллу с ума. Не пора ли ее..."

traits.locale_text: "It seems the connection with the Lord Captain is slowly driving Kibellah mad. Isn't it time she—"

languages.text: "Die Verbindung zum Lord Captain treibt Kibellah wohl langsam in den Wahnsinn. Sollten wir vielleicht ..."
languages.original_text: "It seems the connection with the Lord Captain is slowly driving Kibellah mad. Should we maybe..."

traits.locale_text: "Die Verbindung zum Lord Captain treibt Kibellah wohl langsam in den Wahnsinn. Sollten wir vielleicht ..."

languages.text: « On dirait que ses liens avec {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine} sapent lentement, mais sûrement la santé mentale de Kibellah. Peut-être devrait-on... »
languages.original_text: "It seems the connection with the Lord Captain is slowly driving Kibellah mad. Should we maybe..."

traits.locale_text: « On dirait que ses liens avec {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine} sapent lentement, mais sûrement la santé mentale de Kibellah. Peut-être devrait-on... »

languages.text: «Parece que la conexión con {mf|el|la} Lord Capitán está enloqueciendo a Kibellah. No sé si deberíamos...».
languages.original_text: "It seems the connection with the Lord Captain is slowly driving Kibellah mad. Should we maybe..."

traits.locale_text: «Parece que la conexión con {mf|el|la} Lord Capitán está enloqueciendo a Kibellah. No sé si deberíamos...».

languages.text: 「ロード・キャプテンとの繋がりが、キベラを少しずつおかしくさせているようね。もしかしたら、私達…」
languages.original_text: "It seems the connection with the Lord Captain is slowly driving Kibellah mad. Should we maybe..."

traits.locale_text: 「ロード・キャプテンとの繋がりが、キベラを少しずつおかしくさせているようね。もしかしたら、私達…」

languages.text: “在我看来，绮贝菈和舰长大人之间的关系已经把她慢慢逼疯了。我们是不是应该……”
languages.original_text: "It seems the connection with the Lord Captain is slowly driving Kibellah mad. Should we maybe..."

traits.locale_text: “在我看来，绮贝菈和舰长大人之间的关系已经把她慢慢逼疯了。我们是不是应该……”

languages.original_text: "It seems the connection with the Lord Captain is slowly driving Kibellah mad. Should we maybe..."

languages.text: "Anlaşılan Lord Kaptan'la bağı, Kibellah'yı yavaştan delirtiyor. Acaba biz..."
languages.original_text: "It seems the connection with the Lord Captain is slowly driving Kibellah mad. Should we maybe..."
